author: Ed Kilgore
title: Trump Already Losing Patience With Being Semi-Responsible
description: If markets continue to tumble, Trump may try to simply call off the coronavirus crisis before the spread of the illness is stopped.
content: After being famously dismissive of the threat posed by the coronavirus pandemic as it grew larger and more lethal for months, President Trump has more or less behaved himself for about a week. Holding daily briefings in which he has accepted and even encourag… [+3887 chars]
